import axios from'axios';var API_BASE_URL='http://localhost:8080/castellicalabria';// Ottieni la lista dei castelli
export var getCastles=function getCastles(){return axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/castelli"));};// Crea un nuovo castello
export var createCastle=function createCastle(newCastle){return axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/save"),newCastle);};// Aggiorna un castello esistente
export var updateCastle=function updateCastle(id,updatedCastle){return axios.put("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/updatecastelli/").concat(id),updatedCastle);};// Elimina un castello
export var deleteCastle=function deleteCastle(id){return axios.delete("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/delete/").concat(id));};
